page.shortlink: api desktop api waitdialog class has close button function
page.description: The .HAS_CLOSE_BUTTON() method displays or hides the close button on a progress dialog.

argument.name: flag
argument.description: .T. = Displays the close button on the dialog box, .F. = Hides the close button.

page.example: dim p3 as {waitdialog} dim i as N p3.create(3,"percent") p3.has_close_button(.f.) p3.Set_Bottom_Message("\cr\lfThis is the bottom row message") p3.Set_Message("this is the top row message") for i = 1 to 100 p3.Set_Percent(i,100) next i p3.close()
